spells.name: Absorb Toxicity
spells.description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

spells.name: Debilitating Portent
spells.description: Inflicts an ill fate on a creature, halving its damage when it attacks or casts a spell

spells.name: Named Bullet
spells.description: Imbues ammunition with accuracy against a specific creature type.

spells.name: Tongues, Communal
spells.description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
